mapper.select: SELECT APPROVALNUM, PARTNERID, PARTNERNAME, PHONE AS PARTNERPHONE, BUSINESSLICENSE, APPROVALDATE , NVL(APPROVALSTATUSNUM, 0) AS APPROVALSTATUSNUM , NVL(APPROVALSTATUSNAME, '승인대기') AS APPROVALSTATUSNAME , NVL(LICENSE_FILEROUTE,'없음') AS FILEROUTE , NVL(LICENSE_FILENAME,'없음') AS FILENAME FROM PARTNER_APPROVAL_VIEW WHERE(PARTNERID, APPROVALNUM) IN ( SELECT PARTNERID, MAX(APPROVALNUM) AS APPROVALNUM FROM PARTNER_APPROVAL_VIEW GROUP BY PARTNERID ) ORDER BY APPROVALNUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT APPROVALNUM, PARTNERID, PARTNERNAME, PHONE, APPROVALDATE , NVL(APPROVALSTATUSNUM, 0) AS APPROVALSTATUSNUM , NVL(APPROVALSTATUSNAME, '승인대기') AS APPROVALSTATUSNAME , NVL(LICENSE_FILEROUTE,'없음') AS LICENSE_FILEROUTE , NVL(LICENSE_FILENAME,'없음') AS LICENSE_FILENAME FROM PARTNER_APPROVAL_VIEW WHERE(PARTNERID, APPROVALNUM) IN ( SELECT PARTNERID, MAX(APPROVALNUM) AS APPROVALNUM FROM PARTNER_APPROVAL_VIEW GROUP BY PARTNERID ) ORDER BY APPROVALNUM DESC )
